actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to authorize the Cook Inlet Regional Corporation (Cook Inlet Region, Incorporated) to purchase its shareholder-held common stock.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act, and for other purposes.
